members.member:
Sends data to an endpoint by specifying the HTTP request options, and deserializes the response payload to a type.
You typically only need to use this method if you are working with resources not natively handled by this library. The type to deserialize the returned data to. The request options. /// The HTTP protocol verb. The cancellation token. The deserialized response data. An API error occurred.

member.name: P:Okta.Sdk.Abstractions.IPagedCollectionEnumerator`1.CurrentPage

member.name: M:Okta.Sdk.Abstractions.IPagedCollectionEnumerator`1.MoveNextAsync
member.summary: Asynchronously retrieves the next page of results and updates . If there are no more pages, this method returns .
member.returns: if has been updated with new items, if the collection has been exhausted.
